detaileddescription.para: interval in milliseconds for lookup retries
TASK stack size for DNS Task
mutex to protect DNS context data for asynchronous lookup
DNS context data, retry timeout in seconds
DNS context data, URL to be resolved

briefdescription.para: Task for asynchronous DNS lookup. If parameter is provided, it must point to a "int32_t" which contains the number of loops. If not provided (NULL) unlimited loops are executed.

parameterdescription.para: optional pointer to number of loops.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *const URL, char *const resolvedURL, const size_t sizeResolvedURL, uint32_t timeout, const LWM2MDnsUtil_Callback_T callback, void *context)
memberdef.name: LWM2MDnsUtil_ExtendedResolveHostname

briefdescription.para: Extended resolve URL. If URL uses literal host (e.g. "192.168.1.10"), the URL is just copied to provided resolvedURL buffer. Otherwise, either synchronous, if no callback is provided (NULL), or asynchronous, if callback is provided.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *const URL, char *const resolvedURL, const size_t sizeResolvedURL, uint32_t timeout)
memberdef.name: LWM2MDnsUtil_ResolveHostname

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *const URL, uint32_t timeout, const LWM2MDnsUtil_Callback_T callback, void *context)
memberdef.name: LWM2MDnsUtil_StartResolveHostname

briefdescription.para: Start asynchronous DNS lookup. Report result using the callback.
This file provides the implementation of LWM2MDnsUtil module.
